{products.map((product) => { console.log("Product Object:", product); // Ürün objesini kontrol et const imageUrl = product.fields.product_image?.fields?.file?.url; console.log("Product Image URL:", imageUrl); // Görsel URL'sini kontrol et return (
navigate(`/${lang}/product-details/${product.sys.id}`) } > {imageUrl ? ( ) : (
No Image
)}

{product.fields.product_name || "No Name"}

{product.fields.product_description && (
{documentToReactComponents(product.fields.product_description)}
)}
); })}
